backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling user profiles, access control, dashboard status, contact info, and message terminal storage with admin/user permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to include email and initializing new message terminal fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme variables and dark mode definitions using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining public, admin, legal, and multi-page navigation using DeepTechLayout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal collecting required name and email fields and saving the user profile via backend hook.
frontend/src/components/connect/AccessGr: Modal that displays a formatted access‑granted email and allows copying the full message to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/connect/Founders: Protected vault UI that manages login, profile completion, and shows contact details or setup/access modals.
frontend/src/components/connect/Messagin: Form for submitting messages with name, email, and content, showing a success state after sending.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contac: Displays a copyable contact string fetched from the backend with loading and copy‑confirmation states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Status: Shows uptime and NTP status cards using dashboard status data with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/landing/Circuitr: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/landing/ConnectG: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/landing/CoreValu: Renders a three‑item grid showcasing the product’s core values with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/DigitalC: A live digital clock component updating every second.
frontend/src/components/landing/Executiv: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Landing hero section with particle background, pulsing logo, and headline.
frontend/src/components/landing/Particle: Canvas‑based animated particle background reacting to mouse movement.
frontend/src/components/landing/ProductS: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/components/landing/PublicCo: Renders a contact section with email and Instagram links using styled cards.
frontend/src/components/landing/WelcomeN: Displays a themed welcome message and brand narrative text.
frontend/src/components/layout/DeepTechL: Provides a page layout wrapper with header, footer, and gradient background.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with navigation links, system status, legal links, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, brand logo, mobile menu, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/routing/AccessDe: Shows an access denied message with options to return home or logout.
frontend/src/components/routing/RequireA: Gatekeeper component that checks admin status before rendering children.
Protects routes by requiring an authenticated identity before rendering content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, auto‑refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Queries the backend to determine if the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Fetches contact info data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Gets and saves the authenticated user's profile using backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardStatus.ts: Fetches dashboard status from the backend with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and context provisioning.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageTerminal.ts: Handles submitting and retrieving message terminal entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom color variables, and utility classes for gradients, glass panels, neon accents, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with a welcome header and embedded status and contact modules.
frontend/src/pages/BoardPage.tsx: Displays profiles of the four founders with images, roles, and descriptions in a styled grid.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectSupportPage.ts: Provides public messaging and authenticated founder contact sections using two main components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page from hero, narrative, values, and public contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/LegalTechnicalDocsPag: Shows legal and safety documentation, including IP ownership and electrical audit details.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Presents the privacy policy covering data collection, usage, security, retention, and rights.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDeepDivePage.t: Showcases detailed descriptions and images of TT-1 hardware components in alternating layouts.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page rendering the Terms of Service with sections covering IP ownership, usage rules, liability limits, and contact info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the project's dark glassmorphism theme.
project_state.json: Project state document outlining rebuild goals, architectural notes, issues, and required images for the Tactic Transmit portal.
